Your Mobile Number Get App About Us Our Story and Mission The Foremost Fantasy App in Goa Embark on a journey with HyperApp, where passion for cricket meets cutting-edge technology. Our story began with a vision to revolutionize the way cricket enthusiasts engage with the sport. With a team driven by innovation and a love for the game, we set out to create an unparalleled fantasy cricket experience. At HyperApp, our mission is to provide cricket fans worldwide with a platform to immerse themselves in the excitement of the game like never before. We strive to empower users to unleash their cricketing expertise, build their dream teams, and compete in thrilling contests. SUPPORT Support 24 / 7 h See More SAFETY Secure Your Data See More DOWNLOADS Download App 1M+ See More RATING 9,98 / 10 FROM 199,999 + See More Contact Us Have a question, suggestion, or need assistance? We're here to help! Email: HyperApp@gmail.com Live Chat: Chat with us live through the HyperApp website or mobile app for immediate assistance during our business hours. Phone: +91 (987) 656 32-39 FAQ: Check out our Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) section for quick answers to common inquiries. Download App HyperApp Download the HyperApp App for Free Enter your telephone I accept - Privacy Policy Download Frequently Asked Questions Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. How do I create a team on HyperApp? To create a team on HyperApp, simply navigate to the "Create Team" section of the app and select your preferred players from the available options. You can choose players based on their performance statistics, current form, and upcoming matches. 2. What leagues and tournaments are available on HyperApp? HyperApp offers a wide range of leagues and tournaments, including international matches, domestic leagues, and franchise-based competitions like the Indian Premier League (IPL), Big Bash League (BBL), and more. Users can participate in contests for various formats of the game, including Test matches, One-Day Internationals (ODIs), and Twenty20 (T20) matches. 3. How are points calculated on HyperApp? Points on HyperApp are calculated based on the performance of players in real-life matches. Players earn points for actions such as runs scored, wickets taken, catches, run-outs, and more. The points system is designed to reflect the impact of each player's performance on the outcome of the match. 4. Can I join contests with friends on HyperApp? Yes, HyperApp allows users to create private contests and invite their friends to participate. Users can compete against their friends and colleagues in private leagues, adding an extra layer of excitement and camaraderie to the gaming experience. 5. How do I track live scores and match updates on HyperApp? HyperApp provides real-time updates on live matches, including live scores, player statistics, and match commentary. Users can follow their favorite teams and players, receive notifications for key moments in the match, and stay informed about the latest developments in the game. 6. Is HyperApp available on multiple platforms? Yes, HyperApp is available on multiple platforms, including iOS and Android devices. Users can download the app from the App Store or Google Play Store and enjoy seamless access to all its features and functionalities across different devices. Make sure you seize the chance to join this exhilarating game today! Choose star players and build a strong team. Step 2: Join Tournaments Participate in various tournaments and leagues to test your cricket skills. Compete with other players for prizes and glory. Step 3: Track Results Monitor live statistics and match results right in the app. Stay updated on news, analyze data, and adjust your strategies. Enjoy the game and become a virtual cricket champion with HyperApp. SUPPORT Support 24 / 7 h See More SAFETY Secure Your Data See More DOWNLOADS Download App 1M+ See More RATING 9,98 / 10 FROM 199,999 + See More What Start Play HyperApp HyperApp offers an immersive and engaging platform for cricket enthusiasts. 1. Competitive Gameplay: Join leagues and tournaments to compete against other players. Test your cricket knowledge and strategic skills in a competitive environment. 2. Real-time Updates: Stay updated with live scores, player performances, and match results. HyperApp provides real-time updates to keep you informed throughout the game. 3. Interactive Features: Enjoy interactive features such as creating your dream team, analyzing player statistics, and making strategic decisions to lead your team to victory. 4. Rewards and Prizes: Earn rewards and prizes for your achievements. Win exciting prizes and climb the leaderboard to become the ultimate cricket champion. 5. Community Engagement: Connect with other cricket fans, discuss match highlights, and share your insights. HyperApp fosters a vibrant community of cricket enthusiasts. How Start Play How to Start Playing App HyperApp Step 1 Download HyperApp: Begin by downloading the HyperApp from the App Store or Google Play Store. Step 2 Sign Up: Create your account by providing basic information such as your name, email address, and password. Step 3 Explore the Features: Familiarize yourself with the app's features, including creating your fantasy team, joining leagues, and participating in contests. Step 4 Create Your Team: Use your cricket knowledge to select players for your fantasy team. Choose wisely to maximize your team's performance. Step 5 Join Leagues: Join leagues or tournaments to compete against other players. Select the leagues that match your preferences and skill level. Step 6 Track Performance: Keep track of your team's performance, monitor player statistics, and make strategic changes to improve your chances of winning. Step 7 Enjoy the Game: Sit back, relax, and enjoy the thrill of fantasy cricket. Follow live scores, cheer for your team, and engage with other players in the HyperApp community. How People Use HyperApp See How People Use HyperApp One of the key reasons why people choose HyperApp is its user-friendly interface. Whether you're a seasoned fantasy cricket player or new to the game, HyperApp makes it easy to get started. The app's intuitive design allows users to navigate effortlessly through different sections, from creating their fantasy team to tracking live scores and player statistics. Mitchal Lucker HyperApp offers a wide range of features that enhance the overall cricket experience. Users can create their fantasy teams by selecting players from various leagues and tournaments, including international matches, domestic leagues, and franchise-based competitions like the Indian Premier League (IPL) and Big Bash League (BBL). The app provides detailed player statistics, including batting averages, bowling figures, and fielding records, helping users make informed decisions when selecting their teams. Nani Dhulipala HyperApp also fosters a sense of community among cricket fans. Users can join leagues, compete against friends, and climb the leaderboard to prove their cricketing prowess. The app's social features enable users to interact with fellow enthusiasts, share insights, and discuss match predictions, creating a vibrant and dynamic community of cricket lovers. Cricsh Kumar Frequently Asked Questions Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. How do I create a team on HyperApp? To create a team on HyperApp, simply navigate to the "Create Team" section of the app and select your preferred players from the available options. You can choose players based on their performance statistics, current form, and upcoming matches. 2. What leagues and tournaments are available on HyperApp? HyperApp offers a wide range of leagues and tournaments, including international matches, domestic leagues, and franchise-based competitions like the Indian Premier League (IPL), Big Bash League (BBL), and more. Users can participate in contests for various formats of the game, including Test matches, One-Day Internationals (ODIs), and Twenty20 (T20) matches. 3. How are points calculated on HyperApp? Points on HyperApp are calculated based on the performance of players in real-life matches. Players earn points for actions such as runs scored, wickets taken, catches, run-outs, and more. The points system is designed to reflect the impact of each player's performance on the outcome of the match. 4. Can I join contests with friends on HyperApp? Yes, HyperApp allows users to create private contests and invite their friends to participate. Users can compete against their friends and colleagues in private leagues, adding an extra layer of excitement and camaraderie to the gaming experience. 5. Your Mobile Number Get App HyperApp Privacy Policy Introduction At HyperApp, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our users. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and share personal information when you use our mobile application. By using HyperApp, you agree to the collection and use of your information in accordance with this policy. Information We Collect Personal Information: This includes information that can be used to identify you, such as your name, email address, and phone number. Usage Information: We collect information about how you interact with our application, including the features you use and the content you view. Device Information: We collect information about the device you use to access HyperApp, such as the device type, operating system, and unique device identifiers. Device Information: We collect information about the device you use to access HyperApp, such as the device type, operating system, and unique device identifiers. Location Information: We may collect information about your location when you use our application, such as your IP address or GPS data. How We Use Your Information Provide and improve our application: We use your information to deliver the services you request, as well as to improve the overall user experience. Communicate with you: We may use your information to send you updates, notifications, and promotional materials related to HyperApp. Analyze usage patterns: We analyze the information we collect to better understand how our users interact with our application and to improve our services. Sharing Your Information Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us operate and improve our application. Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to a valid legal request. Business Transfers: If HyperApp is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction. Data Security We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make any material changes, we will notify you by posting the updated policy on our website or within the HyperApp application. Your continued use of HyperApp following the posting of any changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised policy. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. If you wish to exercise these rights. Third-Party Links HyperApp may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties, and we encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing them with your personal information. Governing Law This Privacy Policy is governed by the laws. Your Consent By using HyperApp, you consent to the collection, use, and sharing of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. Your Consent By using HyperApp, you consent to the collection, use, and sharing of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. By using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the App. Description of Services The App is a mobile application that allows users to create and share short videos. Users can also interact with other users' videos by liking, commenting, and sharing them. Account Creation To use the App, you must create an account. When you create an account, you agree to provide accurate and complete information. You also agree that you are at least 18+ years old. User Content Any content that you create or share on the App (including videos, comments, and messages) is referred to as 'User Content.' You retain all intellectual property rights in your User Content. However, by sharing User Content on the App, you grant HyperApp a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide, irrevocable license to use, reproduce, modify, distribute, and display your User Content on the App. Prohibited Conduct You agree not to use the App for any purpose that is prohibited by these Terms or by applicable law. This includes, but is not limited to, posting or sharing User Content that: is defamatory, libelous, or slanderous, is pornographic or sexually explicit, is hateful, discriminatory, or harassing, is infringing or violates any copyright, trademark, or other intellectual property right. Privacy Policy HyperApp's Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share your personal information. By using the App, you agree to the terms of the Privacy Policy. Third-Party Services The App may use third-party services, such as social media platforms and payment processors. These third-party services have their own terms of service and privacy policies. You agree to comply with all applicable terms of service and privacy policies when using these third-party services. Intellectual Property The App and all of its content, including but not limited to the HyperApp name, logo, and design, are the property of HyperApp or its licensors. Indemnity You agree to indemnify and hold harmless HyperApp and its officers, directors, employees, agents, and successors from and against any and all claims, damages, losses, and expenses (including reasonable attorney's fees) arising out of or relating to your use of the App. Disclaimer of Warranties THE APP IS PROVIDED 'AS IS' AND 'AS AVAILABLE' WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. HYPERAPP DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THE APP WILL BE ERROR-FREE OR UNINTERRUPTED, OR THAT IT WILL MEET YOUR SPECIFIC REQUIREMENTS. Term and Termination These Terms shall remain in effect until they are terminated by either party. HyperApp may modify these Terms at any time by posting a revised version on the App. By continuing to use the App after a revised version of these Terms has been posted, you agree to be bound by the revised version. We are excited to have you join our growing community and hope that HyperApp will become an essential part of your daily routine. Thanks for downloading HyperApp: HyperApp boasts a sleek and intuitive user interface, designed to make navigation and interaction with the app as seamless as possible. Our team has put in countless hours to ensure that the app is easy to use, even for those who are not tech-savvy. We understand that every user has unique preferences and requirements. That's why HyperApp offers a wide range of customization options, allowing you to tailor the app to your specific needs. We encourage you to share your experience with HyperApp with your friends and family. To stay connected with the HyperApp community, be sure to follow us on social media and join our in-app forums.
